title: FS: T3 Turkey Red Christy Mathewson - PSA-4 *SOLD*
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS: T3 Turkey Red Christy Mathewson - PSA-4 *SOLD*
posts.post_content:
EBAY is going to ding me 10% if I sell there, make me an offer and I'll do my best to work it out with you.  Thanks!!


For sale is a very special card, the T3 Turkey Red Christy Mathewson, graded PSA-4.   T3 prices are not going down - but my prices are not going up!!

Colors, graphics and focus on this card are extra sharp.  I can see a very light surface crease when looking at the back left bottom corner area.

SMR shows $3500, not sure what VCP says - I am asking $3250 OBO.

If you are looking for other graded T3s, I just recieved a batch of about 60 back from PSA - lots of great cards, the majority being in the PSA-3 range, so they are priced to sell. I also have a PSA-4 Young, a PSA-3 Lajoie and a few other nice HOFers.

Best,
Craig
What a great card! Best of luck with the sale!
